languages.text: Si todos los ataques realizados como parte de {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Danza de espada{/g} se dirigen contra el mismo objetivo, el último golpe inflige el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: If all the strikes made as part of {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} are directed against the same target, the last strike deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si todos los ataques realizados como parte de {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Danza de espada{/g} se dirigen contra el mismo objetivo, el último golpe inflige el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: 如果{g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}利刃之舞{/g}的所有攻击都攻击了同一个目标，则最后一击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}翻倍。
languages.original_text: If all the strikes made as part of {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} are directed against the same target, the last strike deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果{g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}利刃之舞{/g}的所有攻击都攻击了同一个目标，则最后一击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}翻倍。

languages.text: {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}ブレード・ダンス{/g}の一環として行われたすべての攻撃が同じ対象に向けられた場合、最後の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が2倍になる。
languages.original_text: If all the strikes made as part of {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} are directed against the same target, the last strike deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}ブレード・ダンス{/g}の一環として行われたすべての攻撃が同じ対象に向けられた場合、最後の攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が2倍になる。

languages.text: {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Kılıç Dansı{/g}'nın parçası olarak yapılan atakların tümü aynı hedefe yöneltilirse son atak, iki katı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: If all the strikes made as part of {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} are directed against the same target, the last strike deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
